title: Entertainment: What's the difference between the Golden Globes and the Oscars?

og.title: Entertainment: What's the difference between the Golden Globes and the Oscars?
og.description: Answer (1 of 7): Golden Globes and Oscars are two of the many different types of awards that are the dream of any cast and crew of a movie. The movies, shows, documentaries, etc. that we watch in theatres or in televisions are the hard work of many people. Just like awarding the best in any other...
